name: Rock Pool Charm
description: Sunshafts pierce the afternoon mist at Port Glaud's sacred rock pools, creating cathedral light around a witch who raises her lantern from atop a granite boulder. Below, a pirate kneels reading cipher scraps by the still water that spills eternally from pool to sea. A coin spiral winds seven turns around the ancient rock—each revolution marking a letter, each turn a step toward truth. Bearing 187°. Cipher output: UL. "Where still water spills, the spiral names the way."
riddle: Where still water spills, the spiral names the way.
